attributes.action: Make it easier for year 10+  students to be able to get work experience
attributes.additional_details: Form personal experience I am finding it very difficult to find work experience with a company same with many others
attributes.background: Make it easier for people in years 10+ to get work experience or make it easier for companies to accept work experience students

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to make it easier for year 10+ students to be able to get work experience, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
